abstract: There's some potentially good news for the thousands of overseas nationals living in Turkey and confused about their legal and health-care status. Turkish authorities have scheduled a meeting with overseas diplomats in Ankara for Thursday to clarify the new universal health insurance mandate.
lead_paragraph: There's some potentially good news for the thousands of overseas nationals living in Turkey and confused about their legal and health-care status. The Sosyal Guvenlik Kurumu, or Social Security Institution, has scheduled a meeting with overseas diplomats in Ankara for Thursday, Feb. 9, to clarify the new universal health insurance mandate.
